(as of Nov 30,2022 08:55:43 UTC – Details)



Multipurpose rotary tool – From woodworking, carpentry, car care to jewelry making and more; Not recommended for cutting, drilling, or routing.
The versatile 7760 Lite is the diyer’s go-to solution for light duty DIY and crafting projects. Includes 10 accessories to kick start your projects right out of the box.
Quick accessory changes – With the patented EZ Twist Nose Cap, accessory changes are easy and done without the need of a wrench. Collet size is 1.8”.
Variable speed – Seamlessly adjust to the ideal speed from 8,000 to 25,000 for optimal control & maneuverability
Easy battery charging – The rechargeable 4V Li-ion battery & convenient USB charger ensures that it’s ready whenever you are, Battery Size: 4-volt, Battery Amp Hours: 2Ah
Battery life indicator – LED light illuminates to notify you when the battery needs to be charged
Portable & lightweight – 360-degree soft grip material allows for comfort & precise control. Cordless design offers the freedom to take it anywhere

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 08:55:43 UTC – Details)

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);

/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

HARDELL is a professional tools manufacturer. Whether you are a professional craftsman, a DIY enthusiast, or a modeling enthusiast in need of precision gadgets and miniature tools, HARDELL’s tools can help you.

Mini Cordless Rotary Tool

Rotary Tool Kits

Rotary Tool & Engraver

【Multipurpose Rotary Tool Set】The high-performance and low-noise rotary tool combined with 55 most popular power rotary tool accessories for DIY fine work, Not for Heavy-duty Projects. Whenever you think of carving, sanding, grinding, polishing or cutting, you’ll find this electric rotary unit is a must for creating your resin crafts. Owning one is like having a whole toolbox
【5-Speed Setting】The cordless rotary tool can realize 5-speed adjustment(5000/7000/9000/12000/15000 RPM),which makes it easier to adjust to a suitable speed to meet the power demand in different scenarios. It allows you to sand in stages safely and carefully. Even people without any experience can easily get started and control the speed easily. Micro rotary tool make your creation handy
【Compact Lightweight】Powerful but small and light, just like holding a pen while in use, for ultimate control and precision as well as for comfort
【Quick USB Charging, Longer Running Time】Rotary tool cordless comes with 3.7V rechargeable battery, can work continuously for 200 minutes. One charge can be used for multiple times, and the range is stress-free. Battery powered rotary tool make your work one after another. (The indicator light will turn green when it is fully charged)
【Rotary Drill with LED Indicator】The upgraded small cordless rotary tool has a blind spot lighting LED design. Reduce backlight shadows and overcome the adverse effects of dark areas on the use of the drill for resin, and provide you with a better experience


HARDELL MINI Rotary Tool is lightweight and small, you can carry it with you. It is suitable for different DIY working situation

  • Product Features：

  1. Cordless design: Cordless design of the rotary tool allows use anywhere without the need for an electrical outlet.
  2. USB Charging: Equipped with a USB power cord, making charging easier and more convenient.
  3. Spindle Lock: Onboard spindle lock makes for quick and easy bit changes.
  4. Variable Speed Tool: With 5 different levels of RPM, which can be adjusted among 5000 to 15000 RPM.
  5. Easy-to-use: You can grip it like a pen for ultimate control and precision as well as for comfort. Ergonomic streamlined design with over-load power-off protection for safe and reliable operation.

  • Application：

Fit for grinding pet nails and detailed works like sanding, polishing, carving, cutting.

  • Product Contents：

3.7v Cordless Rotary Tool and 55 Accessories(include USB)


Cordless Rotary Tool with 55 pcs Accessories

What you will get:

  • Cordless Rotary Tool x1
  • Sanding Bands x28
  • Grinding Bits x5+ Diamond Bits x5
  • Collets x6 + Mandrels x2
  • Polishing Wheels x2 + Twist Drill Bit x4 + Cutting Disc x2
  • Accessories Case x2
  • USB Cable x1
Warning

  1. Not for Heavy-duty Projects
  2. Do not press the lock button until the tool fully stops, or it may cause damage or even injury.
  3. Please refer to the instruction manual for a detailed operation guide.

Very useful for arts and crafts projects and small home repairs and are excellent for working in small or hard-to-reach spaces

Specifications

  • 1. Rating: 3.7V
  • 2. 5-Speed: 5000/7000/9000/12000/15000 RPM (no load)
  • 3. Color: Orange
  • 4. Collet Size: 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.4/3.0/3.2mm diameter
  • 5. Charging Port: Micro USB
  • 6. Tool Weight: 0.135kg
  • 7. Tool Size: 3.4*17.5CM

Read more





5 Rotation Speed

5 Rotation Speed controlled, you can make the speed control finely by adjusting the tool to better complete the job.

USB Charging

Rechargeable via supplied compatible USB connector at any place, more convenience for your charging. Full charging time is about 2-4 hours, and the indicator light will turn green when it is fully charged.

Easy to Use

The cordless tool with 7 different sizes compatible collet and spindle lock allows you to quickly and easily change accessories on Rotary tools. (Please make sure the bits are fixed in the rotary tool every time)

Light & Small

Powerful but small and light, like holding a pen when using.

Read more

Installation Instructions


Application




Sanding

Sanding belts and sanding discs can help your handmade crafts become smoother and smooth out the uneven surface of crafts. Such as steel rust, paint and rough wooden boards can be removed by the sanding rotary tool.

Carving

It is very easy to use for accurate DIY craft engraving on glass, wood, metal, plastic, mirrors, and other materials. You can engrave any pattern you like to create a unique gift for your family and friends.

Drilling

This Cordless Rotary Tool can be used for diamond drilling. Different sizes of drill bits and special cutting heads allow you to work easily on wood.

Read more




Polishing

Mini Rotary tools can help you remove rust from some metal surfaces. polishing Wheel and Abrasive Stone are suitable for polishing various materials. Reduce the surface roughness of the product to make its surface bright and flat.

Grinding

You can easily remove rust and polish the metal surface of the object to make the handwork more perfect.

Cutting

Suitable for cutting only light and small projects. Easy to cut plastics, wood, housings, and aluminum brass, etc.

Read more

item.title: Garden DIY: 25 Fun-to-Make Projects for an Attractive and Productive Garden (CompanionHouse Books) Plans & Step-by-Step Instructions for a Compost Bin, Rain Barrel, Birdbath, Arbor, Trellis, and More
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Make the most of your garden! 25 step-by-step projects that are easy to accomplish with only basic techniques and inexpensive materialsOver 600 photos and illustrations take you through every step and processCreate bee-friendly flower gardens, mason bee house, trellises, raised beds, cold frames, compost bins, birdbaths, garden gates, benches, and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:36 UTC – Details)

Make the most of your garden!

25 step-by-step projects that are easy to accomplish with only basic techniques and inexpensive materialsOver 600 photos and illustrations take you through every step and processCreate bee-friendly flower gardens, mason bee house, trellises, raised beds, cold frames, compost bins, birdbaths, garden gates, benches, and moreComplete plans, how-to photos, construction and painting tips, and a cut list, skill level, and time frame for each project

Get inspired to get your hands dirty with Garden DIY!

Packed with complete plans and easy-to-follow construction tips, Garden DIY offers a creative mix of both practical and decorative projects for any gardening enthusiast. These 25 fun and useful outdoor projects range from easy to intermediate to advanced, and each is handily color-coded to its skill level.

Inside this book, brother and sister team Samantha and Daniel Johnson present 25 hands-on projects for aspiring horticulturalists. From a potting bench, planter box, and trellis to compost bins, a brick birdbath, bird houses, and a mason bee lodge, these beginner-friendly projects come with clear step-by-step color photographs to guide you through each process.

The book begins with an introduction to the DIY mindset which explains the positive benefits and satisfaction of building things yourself. Then, you’ll find a helpful overview of the basic tools and skills you’ll need to complete each task, as well as helpful construction and painting tips. The included Project Directory provides each project’s estimated time required for completion and a skill level key, so you can easily find the projects that are right for you.

Inside Garden DIY, you’ll learn how to:

Plant potatoesBuild a rain barrelCreate a wheelbarrow gardenConstruct a compost binPlant a bee-centric gardenBuild a pergola garden swingMake a house for mason bees…and much more!

Get started creating the garden of your dreams, with Garden DIY!

“I’m an all thumbs guy, but Samantha and Daniel make these garden projects look so easy that I might take a run at building a new raised bed this weekend!”
—Todd Heft, Big Blog of Gardening

Product Description

The Moongo Tool UNIVERSAL SOCKET is a must have tool for both the professional and the average person. It instantly adjusts to grip hex nuts, hooks, eye and lag screws, bolt heads, and other various shape and size objects. Perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, auto repair, and other household maintenance. A great gift idea for dad, mom, father, mother, friends and family.

mens christmas gifts

You won’t know they needed a MoongoTool Universal Socket until they have one!

Built for Durability

We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly.

Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!

One Size Fits Most

The MoongoTool Universal Socket fits both standard 1/4 to 3/4 inch and metric 7 to 9 mm nuts and bolts.

It can also grasp hex nuts, square nuts, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads!

You Got The Power

The 3/8″ adapter included turns any power drill instantly into a power socket driver.

Loosen and tighten fasteners in seconds and get the job done even faster!

christmas gifts for men

Save Time And Money

Our innovative tool allows for going from fastener to another seamlessly.

No more stopping, searching, and switching for the correct socket.

The Perfect Gift for any Occasion!

The must have gift for the Father, Husband, Handyman, Guys, Boyfriend, Him, Do-It-Yourselfer, Boyfriend, Man or Woman.

This makes the perfect gift for the not-so-handy.

Suitable for DIY

Professional self adjusting universal repair tools.Can be used in household maintenance, and construction

Trying to find a gift for someone that has every tool? Chances are they don’t have this!

UNIVERSAL SOCKET WRENCH can be adjusted to unscrew most metric, wing nuts, broken nuts, stripped nuts, eye bolts, square nuts, hexes, etc.unique design of the Hexagon and Spring Pins can be closely engaged with the parts, not easy to slip. Perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, automotive repair, and other household maintenance.
TOOS FOR MEN: Self-adjustable from standard 1/4in to 3/4in and metric 7mm to 19mm with over 130lbs of torque. Adapter turns your drill into a socket driver.
SPECIALLY MATERIAL: Durable chrome vanadium steel material, the hardness can reach 56HRC. We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly, Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!
GIFTS FOR MEN who have everything, a perfect gift for Father’s day/Mother’s day/Birthday/Valentines Day/Christmas/Anniversary /Halloween/Thanksgiving gifts etc. fathers day gifts for dad/grandpa/stepdad/hushand/brother from wife/daughter/son/girlfriend/kids. You won’t know you need universal socket until you have one! Make it yours now and make your life more easier.

Product Description

A Basic house repair tool kit is essential whether you are doing basic DIY work or working household projects. M MEEPO 186-piece tool set is suitable for most home repair, auto repair and DIY projects. All the tools are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability. Each tool fits snugly into its respective place to prevent moving around and scraping. 186-piece high quality tool kit includes hammer, flat & phillips screwdriver set, adjustable water pump pliers, tape measure, socket set and socket adapter, screwdriver bit set and holder, Metric allen wrench set, lineman pliers, magnetic level and etc. All tools are made of high quality chrome vanadium steel forged at high temperature, high strength, high hardness, durability, corrosion resistance. This tool set can be used in indoor and outdoor. Suitable for most house maintenance, DIY projects and etc

1-Piece Tool Box (Size: 15x12x3.5 inch )

From the brand

All in One Tools

Easy to Work

Gifts for Men

To My Best Love

How did we get started?

We started out as architects. Inspired by our day-to-day tool usage, we founded ForChic with a commitment to giving everyone the perfect tool they need.

What makes our products different?

Satisfying every customer is our ultimate pursuit. To get it, we need to optimize every detail at all costs.

Why do we love what we do?

We like to learn more about our competitors every day, learn from others’ strengths and improve them, and over time, our products will become more and more impeccable, and more and more customers will be satisfied.

High Precise Shape Duplication: Copy any shape or duplicate any object profile with ease. Great for tiling, wallpapering, circular frames, ducts fitting tiles, laminate, carpet, checking dimensions, moulding, etc. Useful tool for operations on car bodies, carpentry and for all kinds of modelling.
Adjustable Tightness and Locking Feature: Never worry about too loose or too tight of plastic pins to slide in. Using an bonus little Allen wrench You can simply adjust the tightness of plastic pins according to your preferences. Once the object has been contoured, lock contour gauge teeth in place for perfect identical traces every time.
Premium Material and Durable:The contour gauge is made of high quality ABS plastic, high strength, rustproof and durable, that will not easily break. And no harm for the surface of the target you would like to shape and duplicate. It is smooth to push and no lack of pins to influence precision.
Easy to Use: Guide the contour gauge’s teeth onto the object, lock the teeth in place, and trace. Copy it, Lock it, Trace it, Only 3 steps, you can easily copy and transfer the shape you want.
Customer Service: Quality and Customer Satisfaction are our top priorities. If you are not satisfied, no reason return policy to guarantee you the BEST purchase experience. And all ForChic products come with 24 hours friendly customer service.

With the ForChic Contour Gauge can easily copy any shape and is simple to use without any guessing, calculation and learning curve. Because it is simple and accurate, it can immediately reduce wasted materials and is good value for money. Very suitable for winding pipes, pipes, woodworking, most types of molding, etc.

Aluminum Lock Design

Metal locking mechanism keeps the shape stable to achieve high precision，designed for easy transfer and efficient work，Making your work more convenient.

Premium Plastic and High Precision

The contour gauge shape duplicator is made of high quality ABS plastic,high strength,rustproof and durable.Single needle down to 0.06″, providing a more accurate data.

Widened Design is More Practical

ForChic contour gauge profile tool is 50% wider than traditional profile gauge, the deepest could reach 2.5 inches, making it very suitable to contour deeper shapes meticulously.

Product Description

Features：

Various Shapes

20Pcs Different shapes Router Bits for most commonly used types, micro-drilling or cutting portion provided in various forms. Great for Wood Carving and Small Jobs,

Widly Used：

Suitable for wide range of materials such as wood, ABS, acrylic, PVC, resin, plastics, etc. Well-suited for detailed work, such as modelmaking, building and sanding dollhouse furniture, model trains, or miniature buildings and planes, house repair.

Application:

Router Carbide Engraving Bits can be worked with most mini-grinding rotary tools or die grinders such as for DREMEL, for Apollo, for Craftsman, for Chicago, for Silverline, GMC, CNC machinery, etc.

From the brand

Make life better by controlling everything in the palm of your hand. From intuitive lights to automated home devices, our smart products lineup elevates moods, moments, and beyond.

Top-tier quality made accessible for any home.

Smart Devices

For the Planet

Part of our mission is to make homes safer, cozier, and happier to live in. And that includes our biggest home – the planet.

That’s why we’ve made sure every Vont product comes with a link to an online instruction manual, so your devices are always ready to make life easier, right out of the box.

DRIVE IN A GALAXY OF COLOR LIGHTS | CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAR – Choose from 16 million colors and 30 unique scene modes. DIY effects, adjust brightness, and personalize this RGB LED strip to transform your daily drives into vibrant road trips.
QUICK SETUP | EASY CONTROL W/ VONT HOME APP – Just plug it in, power on, and lay out the 21-feet, single-design strip light suitable for various car models. Secure with the cable ties/stickers included and wirelessly control with the app or via a convenient controller.
﻿LIGHTS JAM W/ YOUR FAVORITE BEATS | ENJOY MUSIC MODE – Vont Car Lights built-in mic syncs with your car’s music in real-time, letting you experience a colorful car karaoke with your favorite beats.
﻿SAFE TO USE & WATER-RESISTANT – The interior strip light’s robust built comes with safety features to make you feel extra secure. It’s flame retardant, water-resistant, has a high-temp resistance, and is harmless to kids.
﻿24/7 CUSTOMER CARE & LIFETIME WARRANTY – Covered for life, it’s warranted against loss, theft, and defects in materials and workmanship as long as you own your car lights. Vont Customer Satisfaction Wizards are with you 24/7 – for life.

Next Level Interior Safety

Vont Smart Car Strip Light’s sophisticated engineering makes sure you always feel secure with its safety features. Rated with IP20 (only for indoor use), it’s water-resistant, flame retardant, and super-safe to touch.

Activate Rhythmic Roadtrips

Color lights are one thing, but having lights that dance to the beat of your music is beyond everyday driving. Activate Music Mode and witness your strip lights sync with your car’s music and unbreakable car karaoke.

Four Mighty Light Strips

The single-design build features four strip lights with twelve powerful LEDs per light. Every LED is meticulously designed to bring you high-grade light that when combined, produces its 16 million-color dazzling brilliance – rousing your car to life.

Exclusive tension spring arching technology creates a fit that’s custom-contoured to the curvature of each side of the windshield. Wiper blades are designed without brackets or hinges, offering improved design and performance over conventional wiper blades.
Easy Installation: This 22 Inch Wiper Blade Pair Is Easy To Install For A Quick Diy Wiper Blade Replacement. These Blades Conform Snugly Onto The Curves Of The Windshield For A Superior Fit. Instructions Included
Clean, Crisp And Clear: Experience An Ultra Clean And A Streak Free Windshield With Trico Windshield Wipers 22 Inch. These Automotive Replacement Wipers Can Withstand Rain, Wind, Snow, Mud, Dust, Or Any Other Debris That Might Hamper Your Windshield’S Visibility
Optimal Visibility: Sleek Aerodynamic Design Withstand Tough Winds And Decreases Wind Lift For The Utmost Visibility During Driving. Driver Windshield Wipers Also Reduce Snow Clogging For A Clear And Drier View
Close Contact Curvature: Receive The Closest Contact With Our Memory Curved Steel Beam Style. Intimate Contact Allows These Wiper Blades To Perform Effortlessly To Remove As Much Outside Extremities

Read more

TRICO Gold All-Weather Premium Beam Blades

TRICO Gold wiper blades are all-weather beam blades that are a step-up from the average, conventional wiper blade. They feature a beam blade design and come with our Swift Easy Connection Technology that allows for quick and easy installation. When shopping, make sure you have your specific vehicle selected before purchasing. These Twin Packs come with both driver side and passenger side wiper blades which ensures you are getting the correct fit each and every time.

Read more

Wiper Blade Features and Benefits

Reduced Wind-lift and Clogging

Low-profile, stylish design reduces clogging from ice during the winter months and reduces wind-lift for optimum visibility and performance while driving.

Better Fit for Modern Day Windshields

Beam blade design allows for the wiper blade to better conform to today’s curved windshields. The more coverage and contact the wiper blade can get with the windshield, the better the wiper blade will perform.

Tested Tough

Tested to last over 1,500,000 cycles.

Hassle-free Instillation

Quick and easy installation.
